sentences.en: But if any widow have children or nephews, let them learn first to shew piety at home, and to requite their parents: for that is good and acceptable before God.

sentences.en: I represent all of the children to guarantee : we 'll study hard to requite you !

sentences.en: I'll requite you for your help.

sentences.en: Our parents's love is great self - giving so that we never can requite it all life.

sentences.en: The bible says to requite evil with good.

sentences.en: We can not requite my mother for their care and upbringing.

trans.tran_en: to give or do something in return for something done or given to you
